item.title: About Me
item.author: anamika.hanu@gmail.com (Anamika Agrawal)
item.description:
Hi! Iâ€™m Anamika Agrawal - a systems neuroscientist and computational modeler fascinated by how structure shapes function in the brain. My work draws on physics, biology, and mathematics to model intracellular dynamics, neural computation, and disease progression.

I’m currently a Shanahan Foundation Fellow at the Allen Institute and the University of Washington. Outside of science, I enjoy writing, building tools that make research more intuitive, and sharing a brain cell with my two cats, Twix and Munch.
